statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_tracking;
SELECT influencer_id, user_interactions, conversions FROM influencer_tracking;
SELECT influencer_id, post_id FROM influencer_tracking WHERE user_interactions > 100;
SELECT post_id, user_interactions FROM influencer_tracking ORDER BY user_interactions DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM influencer_tracking GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT * FROM influencer_tracking WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY user_interactions DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, post_id, user_interactions FROM influencer_tracking WHERE post_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND user_interactions < 50;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(user_interactions) AS total_interactions FROM influencer_tracking GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_interactions > 100;
SELECT influencer_id, post_id, user_interactions, conversions FROM influencer_tracking WHERE influencer_id = 5 OR conversions < 5 ORDER BY conversions ASC, user_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_tracking WHERE user_interactions > 20 OR (conversions > 5 AND post_id BETWEEN 3 AND 6) ORDER BY user_interactions ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 1000;
SELECT influencer_id, name, category FROM influencers ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT category, count(*) as num_influencers FROM influencers GROUP BY category ORDER BY num_influencers DESC;
SELECT i.name, i.followers, u.interaction_type FROM influencers i JOIN user_interactions u ON i.influencer_id = u.influencer_id WHERE u.interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT category, avg(followers) as avg_followers FROM influencers GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM Posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, post_content, likes_count FROM Influencers JOIN Posts ON Influencers.influencer_id = Posts.influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers
SELECT post_content, likes_count FROM Posts
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Interactions
SELECT * FROM Influencers JOIN Posts ON Influencers.influencer_id = Posts.influencer_id
SELECT influencer_name, post_content, likes_count FROM Influencers JOIN Posts ON Influencers.influencer_id = Posts.influencer_id
SELECT * FROM influencer;
SELECT influencer_name FROM influencer ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_likes, post_comments FROM post WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interaction WHERE post_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT conversion_id, user_id, conversion_date FROM conversion WHERE conversion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM influencer;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_id FROM influencer ORDER BY influencer_name DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_likes, post_date FROM post WHERE influencer_id = 3 AND post_likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date ASC;

SELECT influencer.influencer_name, post.post_content, user_interaction.interaction_type FROM influencer INNER JOIN post ON influencer.influencer_id = post.influencer_id INNER JOIN user_interaction ON post.post_id = user_interaction.post_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interaction GROUP BY user_id HAVING interaction_count > 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencer;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencer ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, name, followers FROM influencer WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT * FROM post WHERE post_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, content FROM post WHERE influencer_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencer WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT i.name, COUNT(p.post_id) AS total_posts FROM influencer i JOIN post p ON i.influencer_id = p.influencer_id GROUP BY i.influencer_id;

SELECT i.name, COUNT(ui.interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM influencer i JOIN post p ON i.influencer_id = p.influencer_id JOIN user_interaction ui ON p.post_id = ui.post_id GROUP BY i.influencer_id;

SELECT i.name, SUM(c.conversion_amount) AS total_conversion_amount FROM influencer i JOIN post p ON i.influencer_id = p.influencer_id JOIN user_interaction ui ON p.post_id = ui.post_id JOIN conversion c ON ui.user_id = c.user_id GROUP BY i.influencer_id;
